title: Sexual Attention Spans & Dating Plans

description:
On today’s show, Emily is talking about better ways to date, as well as helping you through your bedroom conundrums.

She gives you some ways to start dating with intention instead of just winging it, what to do when it seems like your partner prefers their vibrator to having sex, and ways to get out of your head during sex so you can actually enjoy yourself. Plus, everyone’s favorite topic – squirting!

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: Uberlube, SiriusXM

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit: sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
